评论详情: Nursing was so easy and couldn’t even tell it was a nursing dress, so cute!! Fit well, Highly recommend!
This dress is amazing! It is true to size and so comfortable! The color is beautiful and it makes nursing in public more comfortable for me and baby.
Love how dressy it is yet easy to nurse in makes it a win win! It’s also comfortable so it doesn’t feel like I’m dressed up!
I have other dresses from this brand that I love. This one was so poorly made and terrible quality

评论概述: Nice to have something to wear to work
评论详情: Need some clothes to work postpartum and this is very flattering. Two pockets is superb for me.
Purchased this dress for a wedding so I could breastfeed in it. The dress itself was a very thin material and wasn’t flattering on my body type. I ended up returning it.

It's not the best or worst dress I've ever bought. The fabric on the skirt is cut & hemmed uneven so one side of the skirt is noticeably shorter. The bodice isn't as long as shown on the model, very short.  Everything else is fine.
Pretty design. Comfortable material. Light weight. Nice fit.

I am 5’4” 163lbs and got a size large.  I wore this dress to a wedding with my 6 month old.  The material was flattering and the bodice didn’t stretch out while nursing like some other products.  I enjoyed wearing it!
The shape is not flattering and the fabric is see-through. I’m returning this along with two other see-through items from the same company.

I was really excited to receive this dress and really wanted it to work. I bought a large because I wear a bra size of 32 F-G (32 DD before pregnancy) with a 28-inch waist. I'm 5'6 and weigh 130 lbs.  This was not flattering on me at all, even with a minimizing nursing bra. The shoulders fit fine but the black portion of the dress is way too short for my large chest.  It ties directly below my chest, not my waist. Feel like a trash bag with big boobs. Returning asap.

This dress is so cute and comfortable. The shirt portion of the dress is elastic where is connects to the skirt so you can easily lift it up to nurse but it is secure enough to prevent any fashion accidents. The tie is attached to the dress and it has pockets which are a huge bonus. Overall this is my new favorite dress. I just wish it came in more colors.
